name: Stunted
description: Stunted is a "finite runner" where you play as Stunt Ed, a struggling stuntman working on the latest low budget direct-to-dvd action movie. While the camera's rolling Ed must circumvent obstacles and other combatant stuntmen, all while avoiding injury and racing the clock. If Ed does become injured you can opt to take a break and regain some health at craft services; however in doing so you will lose precious time and as result Ed will earn less money (which he needs to pay his exorbitant medical bills)!
